summary: This document is an email chain from November 2019 among federal prosecutors in the Southern District of New York (SDNY) discussing scheduling a meeting to catch up on the Epstein investigation. It includes a substantive update about a meeting in California with a potential victim, noting that an enticement charge was unlikely and the victim was undecided about pursuing a criminal case.

persons.name: Unknown SDNY Prosecutor 1
persons.context: Participant in email chain scheduling a meeting to discuss the Epstein investigation; mentions having a lunch meeting and a call.

persons.name: Unknown SDNY Prosecutor 2
persons.context: Participant in email chain; suggests meeting times and provides a substantive update about a California interview with a potential victim.

persons.name: Unknown SDNY Prosecutor 3
persons.context: Participant in email chain; coordinates meeting times and mentions being in White Plains.

connections.description: Colleagues within the SDNY office coordinating a meeting to discuss the Epstein investigation.
Colleagues within the SDNY office discussing case updates and scheduling.

events.title: California Interview with Potential Victim
events.description: Prosecutors met with a potential victim in California; the meeting did not yield significant new information, and an enticement charge was deemed unlikely based on timing/location. The victim was undecided about pursuing a criminal case.

events.title: Scheduled Proffer Session
events.description: A person (likely a witness or associate) is scheduled to come in for a limited proffer to discuss her background.

keyFacts: Prosecutors from the SDNY were actively investigating Epstein-related matters in November 2019, after Epstein's death in August 2019.
A meeting with a potential victim in California concluded that an enticement charge was 'almost certainly' not viable due to timing and location facts.
The potential victim from the California meeting was still unsure about pursuing a criminal case as of November 2019.
Prosecutors were working through a 'pile of memos' and had scheduled a limited proffer session with an individual for late November 2019.
